page.title: 10THE MIDDLE SCHOOL-3.Work
page.content: The school day starts at 9.00am.and ends at 3.30pm.We have two playtimes, each lasting fifteen minutes and an hour for lunch. The subjects we cover in our timetable are:-English,Maths,French,Science, Religious Education,Music,Physical Education,Art and Craft,Social Studies and Cookery.We have a number of other activities which take place after school,like Netball and Football matches,Gymnastics Club and choir practices. Major events which take place during the year include:-Sports Day,Swimming Gala,Cross Country Races,Concerts and Plays,Christmas parties and visits to various places of interest. The Parent Teacher Association organise an Autumn Show,a Summer Fayre a Barn Dance,a Treasure Hunt and other fund-raising activities.
